The first grioths encountered on a new world are scouts. Typically traveling the vastness of space via one-way portals from their home worlds, grioth scouts never expect to see their homes again, as grioth leadership ensures true devotion to the colonization effort by stranding them on new worlds. **[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)** ([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14)): DC 17 **[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 15 **[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 12 [Grioth Scout](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1180) **Source** [Bestiary 3](/Sources.aspx?ID=66) pg. 122 **Perception** +7; [greater darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12), echolocation (precise) 20 feet **Languages** [Aklo](/Languages.aspx?ID=13), [Grioth](/Languages.aspx?ID=65); [telepathy](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=37) 30 feet **Skills** [Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +7, [Occultism](/Skills.aspx?ID=11) +6, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +7 **Str** +0 **Dex** +4 **Con** +2 **Int** +1 **Wis** +2 **Cha** +0 **Echolocation** A grioth can use its hearing as a precise sense at the listed range. **Items** [voidglass kukri](/Weapons.aspx?ID=56) --- **AC** 17 **Fort** +5 **Ref** +9 **Will** +7 **HP** 16 **Immunities** cold **Weaknesses** fire 3 **[Light Blindness](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=22)**
**No Breath** A grioth doesn't breathe except to speak and is immune to effects that require breathing (such as an [inhaled](/Traits.aspx?ID=96) [poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126)). --- **Speed** 25 feet, fly 30 feet **Melee** kukri +7 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179), [Trip](/Traits.aspx?ID=196)), **Damage** 1d6 slashing **Melee** jaws +7 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179)), **Damage** 1d4 piercing plus grioth venom **Occult Innate Spells** DC 16, attack +8 - **Cantrips (1st)** [Daze](/Spells.aspx?ID=61), [Detect Magic](/Spells.aspx?ID=66), [Mage Hand](/Spells.aspx?ID=177), [Telekinetic Projectile](/Spells.aspx?ID=334) - **1st** [Phantom Pain](/Spells.aspx?ID=220) **Grioth Venom** ([Emotion](/Traits.aspx?ID=60), [Fear](/Traits.aspx?ID=68), [Mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106), [Poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126)) **Saving Throw** Fortitude DC 17; **Maximum Duration** 6 rounds; **Stage 1** [frightened 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=19) (1 round); **Stage 2** frightened 2 (1 round); **Stage 3** frightened 3 (1 round) **Shock Mind** ([Enchantment](/Traits.aspx?ID=61), [Mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106), [Occult](/Traits.aspx?ID=120)) The grioth scout makes a Strike with a voidglass weapon. If the Strike hits, it deals an additional 1d6 mental damage, and the target must succeed at a DC 17 Will save (this has the [incapacitation](/Traits.aspx?ID=93) trait) or become [confused](/Conditions.aspx?ID=5) for 1 round.
